New Records: Adolis Garcia set a record for RBIs in a postseason series with 15
Key Match Events: Texas Rangers won all seven games in the ALCS as the road team
Adolis Garcia hit two home runs and a grand slam in Game 6
Pre-Game Insights: Texas Rangers were underdogs and had to win all road games in the playoffs
Bruce Bochy's experience and past successes brought confidence to the team
Post-Match Reflections: Houston Astros were dethroned as champions
Dusty Baker reflected on the team's pride despite the loss
Texas Rangers' victory was a significant moment for their manager and the team's turnaround
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the second time a road team won every game in a best-of-seven series
Both teams had identical regular-season records, making the series winner a tiebreaker
Others: Jose Altuve hit his 27th career postseason homer
Yordan Alvarez had six home runs in the playoffs
